Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the recall of class B firefighting foam that contains intentionally added PFAS; repealer
Summary: Relates to the recall of a class B firefighting foam; prohibits the sale or distribution of firefighting personal protective equipment that contains intentionally added PFAS.
LawCode: Amd ยง391-u, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the recall of class B firefighting foam and prohibiting the sale or distribution of firefighting personal protective equipment that contains intentionally added PFAS; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
